Quick update, Emma —

- Product: Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T‑Shirt (P030)
- Unit price: $17.28
- Quantity: 2
- Subtotal: $34.56
- Date (today): 2024-05-19

When I tried to complete the purchase the account requires verification. The site sent a one‑time password (OTP) to your shopping account inbox and the checkout was paused waiting for that OTP. I attempted to read the verification email, but access to the inbox was blocked (the inbox request returned no readable results), so I don’t have the OTP.

Next steps I can take as soon as you provide one of the following:
- Paste the OTP here and I will verify your account and finish the checkout (I’ll call the verification function and then complete the purchase).  
OR
- If you prefer, check the shopping account email for the OTP and paste it here.
